Inter IIT: The primary goal of every sports club of the IIT (annual event)

Aquatics Spardha: Inter hostel competition (annual event)

Aquatics Spirit: Inter college competition (annual event)

Friendly Matches : Held at regular intervals against the local swim teams and clubs
